## Gaia Peer Ekleme

### 1. adım

```
PEERS="86d8c7991b6cd8223250859c6c8ec91fe6beb528@34.71.22.241:26656,3237468eae4eda47a5b3a05fb1f1758d55a9bb29@116.202.227.117:23656,3d516329bdf3ff13178bf0c094384200f29bbd36@65.109.31.7:23656,5011e2778cb49b9ae800d671e43802b252b9fbe6@78.107.234.44:36656,465547a24c21d8ae4d80d2b688766c13a35a726d@135.181.202.21:23656,214bfdf818aaa25f999295f471b5c16cc7d0f438@34.88.169.86:23656,bd531fc26b827bc0b6dc5afd2b1a816256629df4@95.216.208.37:23656,c31b962022031e1edd34b0a395a8338fb8062180@38.242.156.249:23656,614807fff2c881c93541cef8105576ea89b32e8f@108.214.8.13:26656,4b4c18d6206da1d82e71dbc1ea21e035eb8f47df@173.249.5.56:23656,a7ecee9a43a16684b09559ef0f872ea36445e37e@38.242.255.223:23656,015254cc413cd447266554162bf35b1881703cfe@194.233.67.89:23656,d448250c04d6ff486db951c1b5e8085ff648ae3e@38.242.139.54:23656,7df15bad855e3ef9e95fab3602872533be6b26ee@5.161.78.112:26656,3c117038682bbd1cc87ae98c802c8bd701601cf7@195.68.159.61:36656,a27d91d3b8b3e42d72aeba1d4e1bbce38a9e5b09@213.246.39.33:23656,2d5cdf2a7456dd66b7a405264b9d16adafd66111@38.242.243.214:23656,c758740c8858c4cfefd8ceab9ce4ef6e92b234ca@38.242.215.137:23656,d9053bf6f6d6c3c3aa3ced40698c8c9440ce5cfc@164.92.217.171:23656,3f114c69d53168044431409a7cd9e6f5869f7586@209.126.83.20:23656,e209ec56f78dcf7c8c56862cefd7c19ef5e81c99@173.212.243.149:23656,98cecf5159d47714a219ed500e36ff2f70d2b977@20.94.46.231:23656,25819455351465ad33d79af1691d1ce187b0b2c9@157.245.68.255:23656,3a1e40fe54ba08c9cc3a3acfa233e28fc2ae4827@194.163.158.47:23656,4dd0b3b158913aadb6ce856ec5b26337e3855a18@135.181.248.69:36656,95662d6a4bbf9f310b8338d7401f32a44d3d4282@194.5.152.20:23656,39caee8d612556e4c194f0cf5c76773869717f05@38.242.156.245:23656,1fb0892581455b14990238b09e4ee928c9ad57be@38.242.225.140:23656,789ae52e1ef1047a73a8f64b8eb3fc2bb54f8ed0@65.21.254.161:23656,6ed9e5186b6fc4a265fe9acf1a4d8b921d2b162d@20.124.103.118:23656,3d8764b50d7552766bb9db60f1cc84e62a8c0f22@65.108.83.217:23656,bbf8f197e34a788486408587e6ebc818260fcef9@2.58.82.50:23656,111f2f9ccc0b9e1b40b5cc353fea2c7ec4882 ```
```

### 2.adım

```
sed -i "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/;" $HOME/.gaia/config/config.toml
```
### 3.adım

```
systemctl restart gaiad
```

## Ben kendi peer'imi öğrenmek istiyorum diyorsanız;
```
echo "$(gaiad tendermint show-node-id)@$(curl ifconfig.me):26656" 
```

**Herkese Kolay Gelsin.**
